phrases.cultural_notes: Common idiom about not dwelling on the past

lebanese.latin: i3mal el khayr w irmih bil baher
lebanese.literal: do good and throw it in the sea

syrian.literal: do the favor and forget it

saudi.latin: i3mal al khair w irmih fil bahr
saudi.literal: do good and throw it in the sea

formal_msa.latin: if3al al khayr wala tantathir al jaza'
formal_msa.literal: do good and don't expect reward

phrases.cultural_notes: Universal Arab wisdom about selfless good deeds

phrases.literal_english: the eye sees but the hand is short

lebanese.latin: el 3ayn btshuf bass el id asira
lebanese.literal: the eye sees but the hand is short

syrian.latin: el 3ayn basira w el id asira
syrian.literal: the eye sees but the hand is short

emirati.latin: el 3ain tshuf w el eed gasira
emirati.literal: the eye sees but the hand is short

saudi.latin: al 3ayn tatma3 w al yad qasira
saudi.literal: the eye covets but the hand is short

formal_msa.latin: al 3ayn basira w al yad qasira
formal_msa.literal: the eye sees but the hand is short

phrases.cultural_notes: Expresses desire without means to achieve it

phrases.literal_english: everything in its time is beautiful

lebanese.literal: everything in its time is nice

syrian.literal: everything in its time is nice

emirati.literal: everything in its time is nice

phrases.literal_english: patience is the key to relief

lebanese.literal: patience is the key to relief

syrian.literal: patience is the key to relief

emirati.literal: patience is the key to relief

saudi.literal: patience is the key to relief

formal_msa.literal: patience is the key to relief

phrases.cultural_notes: Islamic proverb used across all Arab countries

saudi.literal: the tongue is a cutting sword

formal_msa.literal: the tongue is sharper than the sword

phrases.cultural_notes: Warning about the power and danger of words

saudi.latin: al yad al wahida ma tusaffiq

formal_msa.latin: al yad al wahida la tusaffiq

phrases.cultural_notes: Emphasizes need for cooperation and partnership

phrases.literal_english: we wish you success and prosperity

formal_msa.latin: natamanna lakum dawam at-tawfiq w an-najah

formal_msa.literal: may God keep you in health

phrases.cultural_notes: Very common blessing, especially after someone works or helps
Said when someone is eating or has new clothes/items

phrases.literal_english: may it be your turn next

formal_msa.literal: may God make it your share

phrases.cultural_notes: Said at weddings to unmarried people, wishing them similar happiness

phrases.literal_english: may God keep you for me
phrases.cultural_notes: Deep expression of love, usually for family members
Youth slang expressing sarcastic doubt

syrian.literal: what do you think of yourself

formal_msa.literal: do you realize what you say

phrases.cultural_notes: Confrontational phrase questioning someone's logic

phrases.literal_english: we need to have a meeting

saudi.literal: we need to hold a meeting

phrases.cultural_notes: Intense emotional expression for deep sadness or sympathy

phrases.literal_english: I don't know where to start

lebanese.literal: I don't know where to start

syrian.literal: I don't know where to start

emirati.literal: I don't know where to begin

saudi.literal: I don't know where to start

formal_msa.literal: I don't know where to start

phrases.cultural_notes: Philosophy about life's ups and downs, karma concept
Islamic concept of predestination, very common across cultures
Said to ward off evil eye when admiring something/someone
Universal Arabic expression for reaching one's limit
Can be threatening or simply predictive depending on tone
Traditional Arab hospitality expression, makes guest feel at home

phrases.literal_english: God make it easy for you

saudi.literal: God make it easy for you

formal_msa.literal: may God inspire you with patience

phrases.cultural_notes: Standard condolence expression across Arab world
Intensified congratulations for major life events
Proverb emphasizing intelligence over appearance
